title: Domains (com.apple.domains)
description: Use this section to define Domains settings.

EmailDomains.title: Unmarked Email Domains
EmailDomains.description: Mail messages that are addressed to domains not in the approved list are marked in red.

WebDomains.title: Managed Safari Web Domains
WebDomains.description: Downloads from Safari will be considered managed documents if they originate from a managed domain.

SafariPasswordAutoFillDomains.title: Safari Password Domains
SafariPasswordAutoFillDomains.description: User names and passwords entered in websites with Safari can be saved if the domain is listed.
